events.message: I received my order two days ago, and I want to request a refund because the product is not what I expected.
The refund request has been identified and categorized under the Refund cluster based on the content of the customer's message.
The customer support agent responsible for refund cases has been assigned to handle this customer's refund request.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I'm here to help you with your refund request and will need some details to get started.
Could you please provide your order number and explain why the product did not meet your expectations?
My order number is 8745213. The product looks different than described, and the size was incorrect for what I needed.
Thank you for the information. We can proceed with a full refund once you return the product. I will send you the return shipping label shortly.
Thanks for the prompt reply and return instructions. I appreciate the quick support, and I will send the item back today.
We have confirmed receipt of your returned product and processed your refund. The amount should appear on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to ensure your refund was received and that you're satisfied with the resolution. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
As we have not heard back, we are closing the case. Thank you for contacting customer support. Have a great day!
